org.sql: SELECT 1 AS one FROM spree_line_items INNER JOIN spree_variants ON spree_variants.id = spree_line_items.variant_id INNER JOIN spree_products ON spree_products.id = spree_variants.product_id WHERE spree_line_items.order_id = "$1" AND spree_products.promotionable = "$2" LIMIT 1

rewrites.sql: SELECT 1 AS one FROM spree_line_items INNER JOIN spree_variants ON spree_variants.id = spree_line_items.variant_id WHERE spree_line_items.order_id = "$1" LIMIT 1
